name: gatsby-plugin-social9-comment
description: Social9 The comment makes it easy for publishers to bring their content to life, fuel colorful discussions, and build engaged communities.
author: Social9 Team

scripts.copy-files: mkdir lib || true && cp .eslintrc readme.md package.json lib
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn copy-files && babel src --out-dir lib --copy-files --ignore **/__tests__
scripts.npm-publish: git push --follow-tags origin master && yarn build && cd lib && npm publish && cd ../
